data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Podravska, Slovenia to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Podravska, Slovenia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 678 believers in Podravska to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 325,322 lost friends and neighbors.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 480 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Podravska, Slovenia to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Podravska.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Slovenska Bistrica
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Slovenska Bistrica, Podravska, Slovenia.
Lord, the believers in the state of Podravska, Slovenia need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Podravska, Slovenia a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Podravska, Slovenia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

location.name: Podravska
location.cities_list: Maribor, Ptuj, Slovenska Bistrica, Ruše, Miklavž na Dravskem Polju
location.cities_list_w_pop: Maribor (95,171), Ptuj (18,164), Slovenska Bistrica (7,454), Ruše (4,503), Miklavž na Dravskem Polju (3,854)
